list.title: Human
list.desc: Humans typically have a wide range of appearances, with various skin tones, hair colors, and facial features.

traits.title: Adaptable
traits.text: Pick an extra Novice Feature at level 1.

traits.title: Resilient Immune System
traits.text: Gain Fortune's Favor on tests to resist the effects of diseases.

list.title: Dwarf
list.desc: Dwarves are stout and stocky, with thick beards and durable builds

traits.title: Low Light Vision
traits.text: You can see in dim light as though it were bright. You cannot see in total darkness.

traits.title: Diggy Hole
traits.text: You dig at twice the normal speed, gain Fortune's Favor on any Tests related to digging.

traits.title: Hearty
traits.text: Gain Fortune's Favor on checks to resist poisons as well as alcohol related effects.
